actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to require that certain textile products bear a label containing cleaning instructions.

summary.text: Authorizes the Federal Trade Commission to require that textile products sold in commerce or imported into the United States bear a permanent label containing cleaning and laundering instructions. Makes it an unfair method of competition or unfair practice to sell any textile product without such a label.

titles.title: A bill to require that certain textile products bear a label containing cleaning instructions.
